price: 75. Waxaa ka mid ah kuwo axdi la galay Alle25: (iyagoo yidhi) Hadduu wax naga siiyo Deeqdiisa, waxaanu bixin Sadaqooyin, oo ka mid ahaan kuwa wanaagsan.
arabic: ۞ وَمِنۡهُم مَّنۡ عَٰهَدَ ٱللَّهَ لَئِنۡ ءَاتَىٰنَا مِن فَضۡلِهِۦ لَنَصَّدَّقَنَّ وَلَنَكُونَنَّ مِنَ ٱلصَّٰلِحِينَ
footnotes: 25. Waxaa loo halaagayaa sababta dhaartaas tiimbisada ah iyo ballantay ka baxeen.

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: wamin'hum man ʿāhada al-laha la-in ātānā min faḍlihi lanaṣṣaddaqanna walanakūnanna mina al-ṣāliḥīna
